00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <cusp/detail/config.h>
00024 
00025 #include <cusp/gallery/stencil.h>
00026 
00027 namespace cusp
00028 {
00029 namespace gallery
00030 {
00066 template <typename MatrixType>
00067 void poisson5pt(      MatrixType& matrix, size_t m, size_t n)
00068 {
00069     CUSP_PROFILE_SCOPED();
00070 
00071     typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00072     typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType; 
00073     typedef thrust::tuple<IndexType,IndexType>    StencilIndex;
00074     typedef thrust::tuple<StencilIndex,ValueType> StencilPoint;
00075 
00076     cusp::array1d<StencilPoint, cusp::host_memory> stencil;
00077     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0, -1), -1));
00078     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1,  0), -1));
00079     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  0),  4));
00080     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1,  0), -1));
00081     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  1), -1));
00082 
00083     cusp::gallery::generate_matrix_from_stencil(matrix, stencil, StencilIndex(m,n));
00084 }
00085 
00086 template <typename MatrixType>
00087 void poisson9pt(      MatrixType& matrix, size_t m, size_t n)
00088 {
00089     CUSP_PROFILE_SCOPED();
00090 
00091     typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00092     typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType; 
00093     typedef thrust::tuple<IndexType,IndexType>    StencilIndex;
00094     typedef thrust::tuple<StencilIndex,ValueType> StencilPoint;
00095 
00096     cusp::array1d<StencilPoint, cusp::host_memory> stencil;
00097     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1, -1), -1));
00098     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0, -1), -1));
00099     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1, -1), -1));
00100     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1,  0), -1));
00101     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  0),  8));
00102     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1,  0), -1));
00103     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( -1,  1), -1));
00104     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  0,  1), -1));
00105     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(  1,  1), -1));
00106 
00107     cusp::gallery::generate_matrix_from_stencil(matrix, stencil, StencilIndex(m,n));
00108 }

00110 template <typename MatrixType>
00111 void poisson7pt(      MatrixType& matrix, size_t m, size_t n, size_t k)
00112 {
00113     CUSP_PROFILE_SCOPED();
00114 
00115     typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00116     typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType; 
00117     typedef thrust::tuple<IndexType,IndexType,IndexType>    StencilIndex;
00118     typedef thrust::tuple<StencilIndex,ValueType>           StencilPoint;
00119 
00120     cusp::array1d<StencilPoint, cusp::host_memory> stencil;
00121     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 0,  0, -1), -1));
00122     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 0, -1,  0), -1));
00123     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex(-1,  0,  0), -1));
00124     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 0,  0,  0),  6));
00125     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 1,  0,  0), -1));
00126     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 0,  1,  0), -1));
00127     stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( 0,  0,  1), -1));
00128 
00129     cusp::gallery::generate_matrix_from_stencil(matrix, stencil, StencilIndex(m,n,k));
00130 }
00131 
00132 template <typename MatrixType>
00133 void poisson27pt(      MatrixType& matrix, size_t m, size_t n, size_t l)
00134 {
00135     CUSP_PROFILE_SCOPED();
00136 
00137     typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00138     typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType; 
00139     typedef thrust::tuple<IndexType,IndexType,IndexType>    StencilIndex;
00140     typedef thrust::tuple<StencilIndex,ValueType>           StencilPoint;
00141 
00142     cusp::array1d<StencilPoint, cusp::host_memory> stencil;
00143     for( IndexType k = -1; k <= 1; k++ )
00144         for( IndexType j = -1; j <= 1; j++ )
00145            for( IndexType i = -1; i <= 1; i++ )
00146                 stencil.push_back(StencilPoint(StencilIndex( i, j, k), (i==0 && j==0 && k==0) ? 26 : -1));
00147 
00148     cusp::gallery::generate_matrix_from_stencil(matrix, stencil, StencilIndex(m,n,l));
00149 }
00153 } // end namespace gallery
00154 } // end namespace cusp
